title: Rizzo: Dr. Needham's Return
theme: Some bridges are meant to be burned
plot_outline: Rizzo faces a typical day that goes from bad to worse when bad luck compounds exponentially. What starts as a simple attempt to buy cigarettes becomes a meditation on some bridges are meant to be burned as Rizzo encounters the usual cast of neighborhood characters and discovers that even small victories come with a price.
